components.chat.noMessages: Be the first one to ask a question!
errors.geolocation.denied: The Share Meals app does not have permission to access your geolocation. For the best experience, please enable it.

geolocation.alert.message: For the best experience, the Share Meals App accesses your geolocation to show posts that are nearby. A pop up will now appear that will request permission to access your geolocation.

pages.signup.communityCodeOptional: Don't have a .edu email address? Enter a community code to join a specific community. Have a .edu email address? No need for a community code!

pages.viewPost.confirmClose: Are you sure you want to close this post?
pages.viewPost.notFoundOrNoLongerAvailab: Sorry! The post you are looking for is not found or no longer available.
